contract.empty: Start by completing the contract name and symbol...
contract.deploy: Your contract is deployed on address:

deploy.message: Your contract is now deployed on address {0}. You will be able to see it in the blockchain (it may take a couple of minutes for the block to be mined). You can now verify it, but please wait until the contract is visible. If you edit the contract, you will have to deploy it again.

verify.message: Your contract is now verified. Be mindful, if you edit the contract you will have to deploy it and verify it again.
verify.error: Error verifying contract. If the contract was deployed in the last 5 minutes, please verify the transaction is mined on Etherscan and try again.

loading.initial: Input your contract ID to load it's methods.
loading.initialMethods: Contract methods will appear here once loaded.

parameters.name: Name can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscore (_)
parameters.symbol: Symbol can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscore (_)

hero.title: 404 - Not Found
hero.subtitle: We couldn't find the page you were looking for, please go back home and start over.

hero.title: 500 - Internal Error
hero.subtitle: There was an internal error, please go back home and start over.
